name: The Download
description:
The Download

A Tower defense game in which you fight off robots and protect an AI.

Instructions (Also in-game) Controls Pan CameraWASD or Hold mouseZoom CameraScroll WheelNext TowerSpacebarPlace TowerLeft click Cancel PlacementRight clickView Tower InfoLeft click on Existing Tower Rules

Protected your AI until it has finished it's download!
Place generators next to crystals to receive 20 power, which can be used to place more powerful towers.
Your next tower is determined by an AI, which will try to figure out what you most likely want to place next.
If a generator is broken you will lose that power, so place them wisely in order to avoid being stuck!

Towers
  • Artillery: Fires explosions at long range, dealing massive damage to groups of enemies.
  • Sniper Tower: Long range and high damage, slow firing.
  • SMG Tower: Short range and high fire-rate.
  • Forcefield: Creates a shield to protect your towers, rarely appearing and limited to 3 max.
  • Generator: Produces 20 power when placed.
  • Landmine: Explodes when enemies near, dealing a single wave of massive damage to a cluster of enemies.
Enemies
  • Basic Enemy (Orange): Simple melee with average move speed and health.
  •  Sprinter (Light Blue): Faster and higher damage, with lower health.
  • Tank (Red): Simple ranged enemy with high damage.
  • Magnet (Green): Disables forcefields after 5 seconds of contact.
  • Builder (Purple): Spawns bugs from a distance, has low health and does not attack.
  • Bugs (Pink): Small, weak enemies spawned by builders.
Any and all feedback is greatly appreciated.
